ud3.9:1.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
ud3.9:1.3: Now at that time, after the meal, on return from alms-round, several mendicants sat together in the pavilion and this discussion came up among them:
ud3.9:2.3: Others said that the best profession is
